pages.text: I had a dream in which I roasted specially prepared marshmallows over a campfire, then, after eating one, looked up at the night sky through a spyglass and watched a distant sun explode. Travelng to the explosion's epicenter yielded something... interesting. Maybe I should seek to do this myself?
